paper_keywords: interval valued (is an element of, is an element of boolean OR q)-fuzzy Boolean (implicative) filter
paper_abstract: In this paper, we introduce the notions of interval valued (is an element of, is an element of boolean OR q)- fuzzy filters and interval valued (is an element of, is an element of boolean OR q)-fuzzy Boolean ( implicative) filters in R-0-algebras and investigate some of their related properties. Some characterization theorems of these generalized fuzzy filters are derived. In particular, we prove that an interval valued fuzzy set F in R-0-algebras is an interval valued (is an element of, is an element of boolean OR q)-fuzzy Boolean filter if and only if it is an interval valued (is an element of, is an element of boolean OR q)-fuzzy implicative filter.
